sub_title: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht
summary:
Project:
•  Implementations of SAP globally (Europe, Brazil, India, Asia-Pacific and US).
•  Green field, roll-out and roll-in projects
•  Project management experience

Support:
•  FICO teamlead experience in global kernel (24x7)
•  Transfer of support to India

My drive is to implement SAP in organizations to improve the organizations ability to perform. SAP is not a goal, it is a means to a goal.

Specialties: •  FICO
•  Internal control
•  Foreign trade
•  VAT

projects.title: SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht
projects.description: The municipality Utrecht is replacing it's SAP ECC system by a greenfield SAP S/4HANA system. McCoy is chosen as implementation partner, Theo is the solution architect finance for this project, working with a team of McCoy finance consultants to deliver the finance component of the project.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: Global Cost Allocations @ams-OSRAM
projects.description: This project is aiming to harmonize the way in which costs for corporate and other indirect departments are charged to business lines and enterpreneurs within ams-OSRAM. This accross various SAP systems and segments within the company. Theo is the project lead responsible for the coordination between the various groups involved, to realise the go-live date of November 2023.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: Merlin - Setup of regional billing entities
projects.description:
The Merlin project aim is to setup regional billing entities within the ams-OSRAM group, in combination with enterpreneurs and the related invoice flows. Theo has two roles:
1 - Lead for system migration and automation: work with CBS as external supplier and the internal sales team to define correct scope of customers / materials / order types to be migrated. For each phase we did one test migration in a sandbox, and subsequently we migrated in our quality system as preparation for the UAT. Phase 1 of the project (APAC and US entities) went live on May 1st 2023 and Phase 2 (EU entities) went live at the end of May 2023. All sales order and invoices flows are now rerouted via the enterpreneurs through our regional billing entities towards our customers. Sometimes we had parallel activities for phase 1 and 2, so we had to manage these activities and user involvement carefully as not to overload the team.

2 - Support in the setup of plants abroad and VAT determination for all sales activities in the new setup.
Here another (small) team was in charge and Theo supported the go-live where was needed.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: ERP Integration @ams-OSRAM
projects.description: ams-OSRAM have merged as companies, and are now integrating their SAP systems.  Theo is returning to the integration project as integration lead for Wave 5, the integration of entities in the US, Switzerland and Germany per January 1st 2023.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: NXP S/4HANA Upgrade
projects.description: NXP is upgrading their current ECC SAP system to S4 HANA 2021. Theo leads the R2R track in this project, which is done by the combination of TCS and McCoy.. The upgrade has a bluefield approach, in which we will adapt the currency setup and implement multiple ledgers during go-live, The R2R team delivered all required documents for the blueprint phase per the agreed date.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: Business Lead Non-Manufacturing Track SAP ERP integration at ams OSRAM
projects.description: The companies ams and OSRAM are integrating into one company. As part of this integration, also an integration of the SAP ERP systems is planned. For the Semiconductors segment of the company this means, that ams entities will move into the OSRAM SAP system. For this project 4 major tracks are setup (Manufacturing, Quote to Cash, Supply Chain Planning and Non-Manufacturing). Theo is the business lead for the Non-Manufacturing track, together with a colleague of IT he shares the responsibility to ensure that the Finance, HR and non-product related purchasing processes are aligned between the two companies and that the migration of the tier-2 / 3 sites into the OSRAM ERP system will be executed later this year and early 2022.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: Cooper Lighting integration into Signify SAP landscape
projects.description:
Signify acquired Cooper Lighting in 2019 and as part of the deal, Signify would extract all Cooper data from the Eaton SAP system and establish a Cooper specific SAP system within the Signify IT landscape.

Theo's role was to support the finance effort in this area during the conversion testing and subsequent functional sytem tests. After the succesfull go-live in April 2021, the supported the effort to establish intercompany EDI invoicing wihtin the Cooper SAP system.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: S/4HANA @Signify
projects.description:
Signify is moving a number of (acquired) businesses towards S/4HANA. A small project team is working dedicated on this effort. Aim is to use the learnings we have from the previous SAP implementations that were done in ECC (most important: stick to standard SAP...).

Theo is responsible for the Finance setup of the system.

In February 2020 iLOX in Germany was the first entity to go live on the S/4HANA system. In October 2020 we implemented Once US as second entity on S/4 HANA. After this we upgraded S/4 to the 2020 version.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: FICO consultant for Irish Distillers Limited S/4HANA Upgrade project
projects.description: In July 2019 we have started to work on the upgrade of the current ECC 6.0 SAP system of IDL in Dublin to S/4HANA 1809. In November 2019 business requested us to prioritize a change in the current export process over the S/4HANA upgrade. McCoy proposed a change in the current flow to meet business requirements, which was accepted by business. This adjusted flow went live mid April 2020, together with an upgrade in ECC support pack, S/4HANA database in the cloud, unicode compliance. All these latter items are preparation towards a simpler upgrade to S/4HANA scenario. This is the next project McCoy will do @IDL. From finance perspective another McCoy consultant will support this project.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: FICO consultant S/4HANA project @Strukton Worksphere
projects.description:
Strukton is implementing S/4HANA using the re-use approach as proposed by McCoy & Partners, copying the good stuff of your 'legacy SAP' into an S/4 system while migrating only the data that is required by business for the future. Theo is the FICO consultant in the project.

January 1st 2020 this project went live with S/4 HANA 1809. McCoy supported data migration where necessary (most was done by business themselves) and helped in hypercare period.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: Lead FICO consultant
projects.description:
Theo is working on several projects:
@Philips Lighting
- Global roll out of new charging model for costs of 'enabling functions', using ECC/BI/BPC and SAC.
Part 1 of this project was delivered in February 2018; in October 2018 the 2nd part was delivered.
- S/4HANA
Proof of Concept for S/4HANA capabilities to support New Ventures for Philips Lighting (Webshop; Internet of Things; standard SAP approach).
- India GST
Per July 2017 GST will be implemented in India. Theo is the lead finance consultant for this project. This project was delivered on time in July 2017. Business in India had best quarter sales in Q3 2017 ever and got reward from the Lighting CFO for their performance.

@RoyalFlora Holland
- Implementation of SAP S/4HANA FICO per April 2017 (QA role).

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: Lead FICO consultant @Philips Lighting IT
projects.description:
After the go-live of the Gemini project in February 2016 and the post go-live support, a number of new projects were started:
- Functional currency conversions
In two existing company codes in the Netherlands and Singapore, the functional (reporting)  currency needs to be changed (from USD to EUR in Netherlands and SGD to USD in Singapore). Since these are existing company codes and there will not be an SLO, an alternative approach is defined for the go-live scenario (01-01-2017). Theo's role is lead consultant, defining the scenario details, aligning with business and ensuring that necessary clean up in our productive system is done.
- A number of smaller activities:
   * 2 disentanglements of Lighting factories that are sold to third parties
   * Transferring all intercompany positions with Philips HealthTech to third party items.
- Act as lead for all finance consultants, ensuring kernel integrity and support them where necessary.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: FICO consultant Gemini project @ Philips IT delivery
projects.description:
The Gemini project is aiming at splitting Philips into two separate companies (HealthTech and Lighting Solutions). In the IT project we have to ensure that all systems are separated in such a way that they are linked to one of the two companies. In SAP this means that all instances need to be dedicated to one of the companies. This means that a number of company codes need to be migrated to another system, for other sites we need to migrate part of the activities or just GL values.

My role will be coordinating the changes for the legal entity changes within Lighting solutions (approx. 50 company codes involved) and coordination of finance activities for the Lighting kernels.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: FICO consultant Disentanglement Lumileds & Automotive @ Philips Lighting
projects.description: Philips Electronics has decided to disentangle the BG's Lumileds and Automotive into a separate organization within the Philips group. As part of this disentanglement there are a number of organizations to be taken out of the Philips consolidation environment and set-up their own  organization. Theo is part of the finance team that is taking care of the finance migration (both managerial and fiscal).

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: FICO Teamlead SAP implementation @ Philips Lumileds
projects.description: Philips acquired Lumileds some years ago and wants to move it’s business to the Lighting SAP PR4 system. The consultant originally assigned fell ill, Theo was asked to take over and bring the finance stream back on track for the project. Main focus was on product costing / setting up bank solution and data migration.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: Delivery Manager Ciber @ Philips
projects.description: As part of the new ‘operating model’ in Philips IT the partners are made responsible for complete project delivery. For Ciber I am responsible for the delivery of all our SAP R3 projects and I am involved in bids towards Philips for new projects. Next to that I am involved in several projects as FICO consultant for Philips.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: FICO team lead Brazil Home Healthcare Solutions @ Philips Healthcare
projects.description: Initially requested to act as senior FICO consultant for developing several legal reports and interfaces, after the initial team lead left the project, I was asked to take over as team lead finance.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: SAP FICO Advisor for factory implementation in India @ Philips Healthcare
projects.description: Advisor for an India project within the HealthCare sector. Translate legal requirements of India into standard SAP solutions provided in the CIN module. I was asked to help with my knowledge of the CIN & India experience from an earlier project

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: Roll In Consumer Luminaires @ Philips Lighting
projects.description:
PCL project, roll in of various countries of Consumer Luminaires (an acquired company) into existing Philips organizations. 

I was project manager and FICO consultant in the Poland project (2010), for the projects in Turkey (2010) and Belgium (2010 en 2011) I was the FICO consultant.

contributors.headline: Solution Architect Finance - SAP S/4HANA Project Gemeente Utrecht

projects.title: Implementation of Hospitality US @ Philips Lighting
projects.description: Hospitality US project, transferring an organization from one SAP system to another. I was project manager and FICO consultant in this project.

profile_positions.title: Senior SAP FICO consultant

profile_positions.description:
Teamlead for 2 SAP kernels 
Global presence
Total team ± 25 people (internal and external)

- The IT organization was outsourced and insourced in a period of 6 months. This put a heavy burden on the teamleads to keep the team motivated and keep current projects running within the agreed time frame.
- Between July and October 2006 the total division was split off from Philips, this meant that all finance systems were reviewed and decisions had to be made on future w.o.w. Amongst other in three months all world wide payments had to be rerouted to Citibank instead of internal routing (incl mapping , testing etc).
- After the split off new w.o.w. had to be implemented, fiscal alignment had to take place and a new business model had to be implemented per January 1 2007.
profile_positions.title: SAP FICO Teamlead CLASS & SPEED

profile_positions.description:
Commercial SAP kernel
Global presence
Team ± 8 people

- Between June 2004 and August 2005 we rolled out our SAP kernel to Asia Pacific (to countries like China, Taiwan, Japan, Korea and Singapore).
- In the second half of 2005 we implemented plants abroad in Singapore and Hong Kong to mitigate fiscal risks in Hong Kong. This was a first step in a global simplification of our invoicing flows.

- Implement 2 company codes in new EU countries (May 2004)
